archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.2c: c) transferring all or part of the risk (e.g. by sharing the risk with an external party or by taking out relevant insurance such as specialised or cyber insurance)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
